entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain changing to light snow and ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
